mass update to remove target for all those targeted to 1.5.3 that were "normal" severity and "priority 3" (on the surface those dont' seem serious enough to fix in a maintenance release). 

If I have made an error pleasae reset target and set priority appropriately.

I haven't been able to reproduce this.  Looking at the stack trace points at possibly a problem down in EMF with multiple threads (an object returned from an iterator is null).  If you can reproduce this, please reopen and include a project showing the failure (just go to your workspace on your file system and zip up the entire project) along with any other detailed steps required.  Also, WTP 1.5.2 is now available.

I have same issue here, trying to export Web Services to WAR. My computer is dual-core if it is of any help and error is done EVERY time I run export operation. It creates invalid WAR file as a result.

Mirza,

Could you zip up a copy of any WAR project which reproduces this and send it to me?  E.g. if your workspace is c:\workspace and your war project is in c:\workspace\mywar, then could you zip up the mywar directory?  Or, if you prefer, you could attach an example to the bug (not sure if there is a size cap for attachments).
I used Help/Software Updates to bring 1.5.3 version on and now it works ok, so it can remain closed, it is fixed in the mean time.
